Studio

Sed nunc dolor, ullamcorper vitae justo vel, sodales condimentum magna.

HomeUnitsStudio

Specification

  • 25sqm
  • Garden View
  • 2 Single Bed or 1 Double Bed
  • Shower Only

Description

Studio Room is fitted with a sleeping area and shower bathroom. The sleeping area is fitted either with a queen-size bed or twin beds. The apartment itself is modernly furnished with elegant, sleek furniture sporting pops of colour, which instantly brightens the space.

Each apartment also includes telephone with IDD and voicemail facilities, LED television with cable channels, in-room electronic safe, hairdryer, maximum occupancy: 2 pax and non-smoking room. Complimentary daily housekeeping and Wi-Fi connectivity are also available.

We always pair guaranteed comfort with great value.
